knimeNode.name: Thinning
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reduce an image to its skeleton, a simplified representation which is topologically equivalent.

fullDescription.intro: Reduce an image to its skeleton, a simplified representation which is topologically equivalent.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select which thinning algorithm should be used in order to calculate the result

If checked, the area of interest for the algorithm is assumed to be white, i.e. the node attempts to thin the white portions of the image. If not selected, the black parts of the image are to be thinned.
